# SpeechDetector.SensitivityLevel

**Enumeration**

Determines how “aggressive” the voice activity detection (VAD) model will be.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SensitivityLevel
```

## Overview

[doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SpeechDetector/SensitivityLevel/low] will allow for a more “forgiving” VAD model, whereas selecting [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SpeechDetector/SensitivityLevel/high] will make the model more aggressive. [doc://com.apple.speech/documentation/Speech/SpeechDetector/SensitivityLevel/medium] is the recommended level for most use cases.

## Sensitivity levels

- **SpeechDetector.SensitivityLevel.high**
- **SpeechDetector.SensitivityLevel.low**
- **SpeechDetector.SensitivityLevel.medium**

## Creating a detector

- **init()**: Creates a speech detector with default settings.
- **init(detectionOptions:reportResults:)**: Creates a speech detector.
- **SpeechDetector.DetectionOptions**: Allows clients to customize an instance of a speech detector.

## Conforms To

- CaseIterable
- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
